name: Brave & Toasty
description:
NOTE: i have no idea if the html version works, and i just can't focus anymore i am so tired 

USED WILD CARDS:

  • Boom goes dynamite
  • Bread

Being a slice a bread is hard, all those toasters want you for a snack 

Destroy them using your handy explosive butter in a topdown roguelike style beating bosses to arrive at the ultimate upgrade to forever be protected from these hungry threats

Game was made in a couple of days due to some problems so no sounds were able to be made, i am sorry :(

It will probably be updated after the Jam, but until then, hopefully you have fun with what it got
